quoteText: For example, under EU laws you have the following additional rights: ● to access information we hold about you. ● to request that we delete your personal information from our system. ● to ask us to rectify/correct your personal information if appropriate. ● to ask us to restrict processing of your data. ● to transmit your data to another entity. ● to lodge a complaint with a data protection authority. You can exercise these rights by contacting us f.ex. here or at privacy@gog.com.
title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

tosdr.case: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
